description:
Developed for the Kobojo framework, tools and web services in C#.
Set up continuous integration with Jenkins and Bash scripts.
Developed a matchmaking and multiplayer system in NodeJS and C++.
Set up AWS EC2 environments for the release of Zodiac Orcanon Odyssey and Primal Legends.

Developed and released a Me Girl mobile casino game.
Worked on user interface, data access, memory and performance optimization, tools.
Developed with C# and Unity3D for Android and iOS mobile devices.
Developed a Level Editor for video game development with C# and WPF.

Developed a web application for DJ with Flex, ActionScript 3 and C.
Worked on user interface, algorithms for audio processing.

Tested websites.
Developed widgets with ActionScript and Flash.
